text: Ohe manabajati! Tomadera prabhuke bhaya-bhakti karo, ara se'i dinake bhaya karo yakhana kono pita tara santanera kono kaje asabe na, ara na kono santanera ksetre'o ye se kono'o byapare karyakara habe tara pitamatara jan'ye. Nihsandeha allahâ€Œra oyada cirantana satya, sejan'ye e'i duniyara jibana yena tomadera prabancana na karuka.
